_xResult.title: Button Me Front Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen jacket with front button closures
_xResult.longdesc:
Pair this lovely jacket with one of your Aiste blouses or dresses, or wear it alone with a simple T-shirt and jeans.  The unique cut of it will flatter your body and looks sharp in any environment. 

 

Patterned all over with Aiste's famous "linen sculptures" in scallop design, the jacket is collarless with beautiful button detail down the front (hand sewn button tabs and self fabric covered buttons). Wear sleeves down or cuffed back. Shape is cut slightly higher in the front, dips slightly in the back for a unique silhouette. Comes in any of the many Aiste linen colors.

Each jacket is made to your body specifications. For precision fit, make sure your Balodana measurement profile includes a full set of upper body measurements including sleeve from back center, and both a straight arm length as well as bent-arm (jacket) length which adds about 4 cm length. If you have any special requirements please list them.

properties.propvalue: Hand wash cold, line dry. Dry clean ok.
